title: "Mister Hadj's Sunset Ride" by Saladin Ahmed
description:
A bounty hunter reminisces about his escapades with an old mentor and friend in this weird western. This story appears in the magazine BENEATH CEASELESS SKIES.


This episode is sponsored by Amazon Kindle (www.amazon.com/levarburton).
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
